DOC.brief_summary: Up 30 subject enrol . All subject receive one Ultherapy treatment low two third face neck . Subjects equally grouped history submentoplasty rhytidectomy naive submentoplasty rhytidectomy . Follow-up visit occur 14 , 30 , 60 , 90 180 day follow treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , 30-60 minute post-treatment , follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Lifting Tightening Neck Skin Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective single center study . Subjects enrol one per group present . Efficacy determine change submental volume cervicomental angle . GAIS patient satisfaction questionnaire also obtain .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year Subject good health Body Mass index less 30 Present unwanted skin laxity submental area demonstrate grade 2 3 Knize scale classification cosmetic deformity cervicomental angle Previous history surgical submentoplasty rhytidectomy great 12 month previous enrollment exceed 120 month prior enrollment Understands accept obligation receive procedure submental area thru 6 month follow visit Willingness ability comply protocol requirement include return followup visit abstain exclusionary procedure duration study Subjects childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test result Visit 1 willing able use acceptable method birth control Pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant use reliable form birth control Has active systemic local skin disease may alter wound heal Subjects prior cosmetic medical history submentoplasty Rhytidectomy within last 12 month great 120 month Subjects prior cosmetic medical history submentoplasty Rhytidectomy
